value.name: Albert Lea man sentenced for his role in alleged abduction
value.description: Rodolfo Valdez, 23 of Albert Lea, was charged with kidnapping, simple robbery, and second-degree assault for allegedly abducting a man in April 2020. value.name: Naples Mayor Teresa Heitmann accused of abuse of power; mayor denies allegations
value.description: A city of Naples employee has accused Mayor Teresa Heitmann of abusing her power to attempt to fire city employees and investigate police officers, a copy of an ethics complaint the employee sent last week to City Council shows.
